name: Duck Race (itch) (Ibzy Studios)
description:
A Twitch chat integrated racing game.
Use !quack to enter the race and watch your customisable duck battle against other viewers while the streamer commentates the race!

Race controls:

  • Left click  - take/release control of the camera, and move with WASD.
  • Space - show/hide racer names.
  • M - mute the music.
  • Tab - show/hide the results.
  • Numbers 1-9 -  static camera views
